title: Watch the SR livestream on 6/11, 10:30am PDT!

replies.body: Dangit, gonna miss this because of school. Will this be recorded and uploaded onto your youtube channel?
I have no school tomorrow because of the teacher rotating strike.  I live in Vancouver.
Thank you teachers :D
Lol you guys are lucky i still have to goto school
i graduated already soooo >:D
I'm done with school so.... yeah I GET TO WATCH
SUMMER!!!
Comment is below {{champion:412}} hold (show)
Even ZionSpartan's Teachers knew that!
Vancouver ftw.
same here, now they voted into a full strike.
Hah me too
Im already out of school. I was in May.
I was in May as well.  In the 1990s.   *Old guy alert*
we should compare white vans, see which one has the more tinted windows 0.0

Upvoted for Brotherhood of the Old Guys.

Edit: Also upvoted for Brotherhood of the Old Guys subchapter Old Guys with White Vans
Well its on Twitch. That means all broadcasts are rewatchable if you go to their channel and click "past broadcasts"
twitch is not available on my computer 4 some reason{{item:3070}}
it may not be available on his comp for the same reason it's not avail on my older mac: outdated flash player, and flash update not possible because of outdated os. {{item:3151}}
I'm missing it cause of work >.>
lol i graduated Jr. High so i on summer break

Ok im seeing alot of this question so ill make it simple 

>If you are going to watch it at 10:30am PDT go to

http://www.twitch.tv/riotgames

>If you are going to miss it bookmark

http://www.twitch.tv/riotgames/profile/pastBroadcasts

Happy Summoning {{summoner:12}}
You are the real MVP.

I love the Epicness of the map, the Sky drop giving it the appearance like as if the map was floating in the air; Makes it Seems more like a battlefield and not just a Map your character is playing on.

It looks more to me like it's on the top of a mountain or something.

Either way, the edges of the map look epic from what I've seen so far.
i'm scared of heights :(
LOL why didn't try out {{champion:80}}  during urf his ult was op
It actually looks like it's an arena that's on the roads to Demacia and Noxus(If you've seen the map of Runeterra)
Wait a second... are we all just gonna ignore the unnecessary 'aloe vera' snuck in there? Phreak strikes again!
http://www.twitch.tv/srlivestream
These puns. Oh goodness. Riot please xP
http://www.twitch.tv/srlivestream
http://www.twitch.tv/srlivestream

I really want to watch, but i have school{{item:3070}}. Thankfully I'm home schooled :D
So it'll get done fast. (hallelujah)
I used to be homeschooled, I know how happy u are. Have a good time doing work in Summer! :D
SOMEONE SHOULD LINK TO THE STREAM D:<
Were the hell do i go to get to the livestream?

Okay I'm seeing a lot of this questions so I'll make it simple.
If you are going to watch it at 10:30am PDT go to

http://www.twitch.tv/riotgames

If you are going to miss it bookmark

http://www.twitch.tv/riotgames/profile/pastBroadcasts


Happy Summoning{{summoner:12}} 

 Thank this man if this helped you **Noirknight**
If you missed it I recorded it :) - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AEyV67A4_54
That was fast. Was actually hoping to see an entire game on it.

Is there any link to the stream? I have just recently started watching live streams on Twitch so I don't know where to go or what to search for on the Twitch website. I searched "League of Legends" and I might've found the right one but I would like to get an exact location. So if you know plz respond and tell me. :)
